analyzed: diṭṭhi byasanena vā phuṭṭhassa aññatara aññatarena byasanena samannāgatassa aññatara aññatarena

original: dukkhadhammena phuṭṭhassa ādevo paridevo ādevanā paridevanā ādevitattaṁ paridevitattaṁ
analyzed: dukkha dhammena phuṭṭhassa ādevaḥ paridevaḥ ādevanā paridevanā ādevitattam paridevitatta

original: vācā palāpo vippalāpo lālappo lālappāyanā lālappāyitattaṁ.

analyzed: āvāsa macchariya kula macchariya lābha macchariya vaṇṇa macchariya dhamma macchariya

original: Yaṁ evarūpaṁ macchariyaṁ maccharāyanā maccharāyitattaṁ vevicchaṁ kadariyaṁ kaṭukañcukatā aggahitattaṁ cittassa—
analyzed: yam evarūpam mad śariyam mad śarāyanā mad śarāyi tattam veviccham kadariyam kaṭu kañcuka tā agga hita ttam cittassa

original: Api ca khandhamacchariyampi macchariyaṁ, dhātumacchariyampi macchariyaṁ, āyatanamacchariyampi macchariyaṁ gāho—
analyzed: api ca khandha mad śariyam pi mad śariya dhātu mad śariyam pi mad śariyam āyatana mad śariyam pi mad śariyam gāho

original: Yo rāgo sārāgo …pe… abhijjhā lobho akusalamūlaṁ.
analyzed: yaḥ rāgaḥ sa arāgaḥ pe abhijjhā lobho akusala mūla

original: Mamāyitaṁ vatthuṁ acchedasaṅkinopi socanti, acchijjantepi socanti, acchinnepi socanti,
analyzed: mamāyitam vatthum a cheda saṅkinaḥ api socanti a chijjante api socanti a chinne api socanti

original: mamāyitasmiṁ vatthusmiṁ sokaṁ na jahanti, paridevaṁ na jahanti, macchariyaṁ na jahanti, gedhaṁ na jahanti na pajahanti na vinodenti na byantiṁ karonti na anabhāvaṁ gamentīti—

original: Yathā vāri padumapupphaṁ na limpati na palimpati na upalimpati alittaṁ apalittaṁ anupalittanti—
analyzed: yathā vāri paduma puppham na limpati na palimpati na upalimpati a littam a palittam an upalittanti

original: Evaṁ muni nopalimpati, yadidaṁ diṭṭhasutaṁ mutesu vāti.
analyzed: evam muni nā upalimpati yat idam diṭṭha sutam mutesu vāti

original: Monaṁ vuccati ñāṇaṁ …pe… saṅgajālamaticca so muni.
analyzed: vuccati ñāṇam saṅga jālam aticca saḥ muni
taṇhā lepo ca diṭṭhi lepo ca pe

original: Muni taṇhālepaṁ pahāya diṭṭhilepaṁ paṭinissajjitvā diṭṭhe na limpati, sute na limpati,
analyzed: muni taṇhā lepam pahāya diṭṭhi lepam paṭinissajjitvā diṭṭhe na limpati sute na limpati

original: mute na limpati, viññāte na limpati na palimpati na upalimpati alitto apalitto anupalitto
analyzed: mute na limpati viññāte na limpati na palimpati na upalimpati a littaḥ a palittaḥ an upalittaḥ

original: nikkhanto nissaṭo vippamutto visaññutto vimariyādikatena cetasā viharatīti—
analyzed: nikkhantaḥ nissaṭaḥ vippamuttaḥ visaññuttaḥ vimariyādikatena cetasā viharati iti

original: evaṁ muni nopalimpati, yadidaṁ diṭṭhasutaṁ mutesu vā.
analyzed: evam muni nā upalimpati yat idam diṭṭha sutam mutesu vā
yat idam diṭṭha sutam mutesu vāti
yat idam diṭṭha sutam mutesu vā

original: Na hi so rajjati no virajjati.
analyzed: na hi saḥ rajjati na u virajjati

original: Dhono na hi tena maññati, yadidaṁ diṭṭhasutaṁ mutesu vāti.
analyzed: dhonaḥ na hi tena maññati yat idam diṭṭha sutam mutesu vāti

original: Yā paññā pajānanā …pe… amoho dhammavicayo sammādiṭṭhi.
analyzed: yā paññā pajānanā pe amoho dhammavicayo sammādiṭṭhi

original: Tāya paññāya kāyaduccaritaṁ dhutañca dhotañca sandhotañca niddhotañca,
analyzed: tāya paññāya kāya duccaritam dhutam ca dhotam ca sandhotam ca niddhotam ca
manaḥ uduccaritam dhutam ca dhotam ca sandhotam ca niddhotam ca

original: rāgo dhuto ca dhoto ca sandhoto ca niddhoto ca,
analyzed: rāgaḥ dhutaḥ ca dhotaḥ ca sandhotaḥ ca niddhotaḥ ca

original: sabbākusalābhisaṅkhārā dhutā ca dhotā ca sandhotā ca niddhotā ca.
analyzed: sabba akusala abhisaṅkhārā dhutā ca dhotā ca sandhotā ca niddhotā ca

original: Atha vā sammādiṭṭhiyā micchādiṭṭhi dhutā ca dhotā ca sandhotā ca niddhotā ca,
analyzed: atha vā sammādiṭṭhiyā micchādiṭṭhi dhutā ca dhotā ca sandhotā ca niddhotā ca

original: sammāsaṅkappena micchāsaṅkappo dhuto ca dhoto ca sandhoto ca niddhoto ca,
analyzed: sammāsaṅkappena micchāsaṅkappaḥ dhutaḥ ca dhotaḥ ca sandhotaḥ ca niddhotaḥ ca

original: sammāvimuttiyā micchāvimutti dhutā ca dhotā ca sandhotā ca niddhotā ca.
analyzed: sammāvimuttiyāḥ micchāvimutti dhutā ca dhotā ca sandhotā ca niddhotā ca

original: Atha vā ariyena aṭṭhaṅgikena maggena sabbe kilesā …
analyzed: atha vā ariyena aṭṭhaṅgikena maggena sabbe kilesā

original: sabbākusalābhisaṅkhārā dhutā ca dhotā ca sandhotā ca niddhotā ca.
analyzed: sabba akusala abhisaṅkhārā dhutā ca dhotā ca sandhotā ca niddhotā ca

original: Arahā imehi dhonehi dhammehi upeto samupeto upagato samupagato upapanno samupapanno samannāgato.
analyzed: arahā imehi dhonehi dhammehi upetaḥ samupetaḥ upagataḥ samupagataḥ upapanno samupapanno samannāgato
saḥ dhuta rāgaḥ dhuta pāpaḥ dhuta kilesaḥ dhuta pariḷāhā iti

original: Dhono na hi tena maññati, yadidaṁ diṭṭhasutaṁ mutesu vāti.
analyzed: dhonaḥ na hi tena maññati yat idam diṭṭha sutam mutesu vāti

original: Dhono diṭṭhaṁ na maññati, diṭṭhasmiṁ na maññati, diṭṭhato na maññati, diṭṭhā meti na maññati;
analyzed: dhonaḥ diṭṭham na maññati diṭṭhasmin na maññati diṭṭhataḥ na maññati diṭṭhā mā iti na maññati

original: sutaṁ na maññati, sutasmiṁ na maññati, sutato na maññati, sutaṁ meti na maññati;
analyzed: sutam na maññati sutasmin na maññati sutatas na maññati sutam mā iti na maññati

original: mutaṁ na maññati, mutasmiṁ na maññati, mutato na maññati, mutaṁ meti na maññati;
analyzed: mutam na maññati mutasmin na maññati mutatas na maññati mutam mā iti na maññati

original: viññātaṁ na maññati, viññātasmiṁ na maññati, viññātato na maññati, viññātaṁ meti na maññati.
analyzed: viññātam na maññati viññātasmin na maññati viññātataḥ na maññati viññātataḥ na maññati viññātam mā iti na maññati

original: “asmīti, bhikkhave, maññitametaṁ, ayamahamasmīti maññitametaṁ, bhavissanti maññitametaṁ,
analyzed: asmi iti bhikkhave maññitam eta ayam aham asmi iti maññitam eta bhavissanti maññitam eta

original: na bhavissanti maññitametaṁ, rūpī bhavissanti maññitametaṁ, arūpī bhavissanti maññitametaṁ,
analyzed: na bhavissanti maññitam eta rūpī bhavissanti maññitam eta arūpī bhavissanti maññitam eta

original: saññī bhavissanti maññitametaṁ, asaññī bhavissanti maññitametaṁ, nevasaññīnāsaññī
analyzed: saññī bhavissanti maññitam eta asaññī bhavissanti maññitam eta nevasaññī na asaññī

original: Maññitaṁ, bhikkhave, rogo, maññitaṁ gaṇḍo, maññitaṁ sallaṁ, maññitaṁ upaddavo.
analyzed: maññita bhikkhave rogaḥ maññitam gaṇḍaḥ maññitam salla maññitam upaddavaḥ

original: Tasmātiha, bhikkhave, amaññamānena cetasā viharissāmāti, evañhi vo, bhikkhave, sikkhitabban”ti—
analyzed: tasmāt iha bhikkhave a maññamānena cetasā viharissāma ati evam hi vaḥ bhikkhave sikkhitabbanti

original: dhono na hi tena maññati yadidaṁ diṭṭhasutaṁ mutesu vā.
analyzed: dhonaḥ na hi tena maññati yat idam diṭṭha sutam mutesu vā

original: Dhono aññena asuddhimaggena micchāpaṭipadāya aniyyānikapathena aññatra satipaṭṭhānehi
analyzed: dhonaḥ aññena a suddhi maggena micchā paṭipadāya aniyyānika pathena aññatra sati paṭṭhānehi

original: aññatra sammappadhānehi aññatra iddhipādehi aññatra indriyehi aññatra balehi aññatra
analyzed: aññatra sammappadhānehi aññatra iddhipādehi aññatra indriyehi aññatra balehi aññatra

original: bojjhaṅgehi aññatra ariyā aṭṭhaṅgikā maggā suddhiṁ visuddhiṁ parisuddhiṁ muttiṁ vimuttiṁ

original: parimuttiṁ na icchati na sādiyati na pattheti na piheti nābhijappatīti—

original: Na hi so rajjati no virajjatīti.
analyzed: na hi saḥ rajjati na u virajjati iti

original: Sabbe bālaputhujjanā rajjanti, puthujjanakalyāṇakaṁ upādāya satta sekkhā virajjanti;
analyzed: sabbe bāla puthujjanāḥ rajjanti puthujjana kalyāṇakam upādāya satta sekkhāḥ virajjanti

original: So vuṭṭhavāso ciṇṇacaraṇo …pe… jātijarāmaraṇasaṁsāro, natthi tassa punabbhavoti—

original: na hi so rajjati no virajjati.
analyzed: na hi saḥ rajjati na u virajjati
